ist.healthcheck.beans

Class MailConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • ist.healthcheck.beans.MailConfiguration

  • public class MailConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    this class contains information about mail configuration needed information sender email, sender password , receivers, icons KPIs, speechminer KPIs, send mail if only the KPIs below average
    Author:
    Mohammed Samir
